item.title: The Senate is back with no shutdown deal in sight
item.description: The House has no votes planned this week, as Republicans try to pressure Senate Democrats to fold and open the government.

item.title: Supreme Court won’t hear Ghislaine Maxwell’s appeal
item.description: Maxwell, an imprisoned associate of deceased financier Jeffrey Epstein, has argued she was improperly prosecuted.

item.title: Who is Karin Immergut, the judge who ruled against Trump in Portland?
item.description: Immergut, who was appointed by Trump during his first term, has issued two rulings blocking the deployment of National Guard troops, drawing the presi...

item.title: Many American Jews sharply critical of Israel on Gaza, Post poll finds
item.description: Most Jews say Israel is committing war crimes — and 39 percent say genocide — while often distinguishing between the country and its leadership.

item.title: David Hogg makes first midterms endorsement against an incumbent Democrat
item.description: Hogg, who gave up his position in party leadership, but had yet to make good on his promise to challenge incumbents.
